net.proteusframework.core.hibernate

Class HibernateSessionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.HibernateSessionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoCloseableHibernateSessionHandler

    @Scope(value="prototype")
 @Repository(value="hibernate-utils-HibernateSessionHandler")
public class HibernateSessionHandler
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Manages implementations of HibernateSessionAcceptor by setting Session instances appropriately.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • checkSessionsOpen

        public boolean checkSessionsOpen()
        Check if the sessions are open.
        Returns:
        true if sessions are already open

                                   SessionLifeCycleEvent.EventType et,

        Parameters:

        et - the event type.
        st - the type of sessions.

      • flushAndClearSessions

        public void flushAndClearSessions()
        Flush and clear the sessions. Note that the clear done here is different than clearSessions().

        public static HibernateSessionHandler getInstance()
        Get an instance. Please note that a new instance is actually constructed for the caller, subsequent calls will return a different instance.
        Returns:
        an instance.

        Get the session acceptor factory.

        Returns:
        the factory. Never null.

        Get the session acceptors.
        Returns:
        the session acceptors.

      • openSessions

        public void openSessions()
        Opens new sessions for the acceptors. Acceptors in the same configuration will use the same session.

      • openSessions

        public void openSessions(CacheMode cacheMode)
        Opens new session for the acceptors. Acceptors in the same configuration will use the same session.
        Parameters:
        cacheMode - The cache mode to use

        @PostConstruct
public void postConstruct()
        Post dependency injection initialization.

      • setAddSessionLifeCycleListeners

        public void setAddSessionLifeCycleListeners(List<SessionLifeCycleListener> slcList)
        Add SessionLifeCycleListeners to the HibernateSessionHandler. This does not clear the list. This is meant to be called by spring.
        Parameters:
        slcList - the listener list.

        public void setDefaultFlushMode(FlushMode mode)
        Set the flush mode for the session created.
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode. Null values are ignored.

        Set the flush mode. For use in spring.
